title: Vin Diesel shows off ‘dad bod’ [Video]
text:
Vin Diesel shows off ‘dad bod’ 
Postmedia Network Monday, October 12, 2015 01:35 PM EDT | Updated: Vin Diesel says Paul Walker's death affected his acting 
If you think Vin Diesel is going to adopt a “dad bod” because he’s a proud poppa and it’s suddenly the in-thing, think again. 
The Fast & Furious star took to Instagram to flaunt his six-pack after some online commenters started to muse aloud that the action star might be getting soft. This comes following a round of pictures of him looking bloated while smoking a cigarette surfaced last week. 
“Body-shaming is always wrong,” Diesel wrote, posting a photo of himself looking muscular in a black T-shirt and jeans. 
But always the showman, Diesel followed that up with a second photo that showed off the abs. “For those who wanted the show... For all the angels that love dad bod regardless.” A photo posted by Vin Diesel (@vindiesel) on Oct 11, 2015 at 11:49am PDT Sponsored Links
